props.query: SELECT uniqueCount(entityName) as 'Brokers' FROM Metric where entityName like 'broker:%'
props.title: Number of Brokers

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.messagesInPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minutes since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Messages In Per Second

props.markdown:
::: beyond
 **Kafka** 

Apache Kafka is an open source distributed streaming platform which aims to provide a high-throughput, low-latency platform for managing message feeds.


:::

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.ioInPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Broker Bytes In Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.ioOutPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Broker Bytes Out Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.replication.leaderElectionPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Leader Election Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.replication.uncleanLeaderElectionPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Unclean Leader Election Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.bytesWrittenToTopicPerSecond`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet topic
props.title: Topic Bytes Written

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.consumer.fetchPerSecond`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'consumer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Consumer Minimum Requests Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.consumer.maxLag`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'consumer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Consumer Max Lag

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.replication.unreplicatedPartitions`) FROM Metric timeseries 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'broker:%' facet entityName
props.title: Unreplicated Partitions

props.query: SELECT latest(`kafka.consumer.totalLag`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago facet displayName
props.title: Consumer Lag

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.consumer.messageConsumptionPerSecond`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'consumer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Consumer Messages Per Second

props.query: SELEct latest(`kafka.topic.underReplicatedPartitions`) as 'Under Replicated Partitions' FROM Metric facet entityName where entityName like 'topic%'
props.title: Number of Underreplicated Partitions

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.consumer.bytesInPerSecond`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'consumer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Consumer Bytes In Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.producer.avgRequestLatency`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'producer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Producer Request Avg Latency Per Second

props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.producer.ioWaitTime`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minute since 12 hours ago where entityName like 'producer:%' FACET entityName
props.title: Producer IO Wait Time in Milliseconds
